map.front: front-facing, camera parallel to face, neutral perspective
map.three_quarter: three-quarter view, slight head turn, cheekbone emphasis
map.profile_left: pure left profile, jawline silhouette, nose outline
map.profile_right: pure right profile, jawline silhouette, nose outline
map.low_angle: low-angle hero shot, camera below eye level, upward perspective
map.low_angle_week: low-angle hero shot, camera placed slightly below chest level, upward perspective emphasizing authority and presence, natural proportions, controlled cinematic framing
map.low_angle_editorial: subtle low-angle editorial shot, camera just below eye level, gentle upward perspective, refined power, fashion magazine composition
map.high_angle: high-angle view, camera above eye level, downward perspective
map.top_down: top-down overhead framing, perpendicular view, planar geometry
map.over_shoulder: over-the-shoulder framing, partial shoulder foreground, subject beyond
map.medium_shot: medium shot, subject framed from waist up, balanced body and face presence
map.close_up: close-up framing, face and upper shoulders filling the frame, intimate proximity
map.extreme_close_up: extreme close-up, eyes, lips or skin texture dominating the frame, obsessive detail
map.full_body: full-body framing, head to feet visible, ceremonial or iconic composition
map.intimate_low: intimate low angle, camera close and slightly below, sensual dominance and presence
map.intimate_high: intimate high angle, camera close and above, vulnerability and exposure emphasis
map.dutch_tilt: dutch tilt angle, subtly rotated horizon, cinematic unease and tension
map.claustrophobic_crop: claustrophobic framing, tight crop cutting parts of the body, oppressive proximity
map.macro_detail: macro-style framing, extreme focus on skin, jewelry, moisture or fabric texture
map.fragmented_focus: fragmented framing, only lips, eyes, neck or partial features visible, abstract sensuality
